meanings.definition: More appealing or memorable than something else.
meanings.sent1: The catchy song was catchier than the others.
meanings.sent2: That jingle is catchier than the one before.
meanings.sent3: The catchy tune was so catchier that it stuck in everyone's head.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter was catchier than a cold in winter.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors made the logo catchier and more unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Having a strong hook or melody that is easy to remember.
meanings.sent1: The catchy tune was catchier than any other.
meanings.sent2: The new commercial jingle is catchier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The catchy melody was so catchier that it played on repeat in my mind.
meanings.sent4: The song's chorus was catchier than a fisherman's best bait.
meanings.sent5: The simple tune became catchier with each listen, impossible to forget.

meanings.definition: Tending to attract attention or interest quickly.
meanings.sent1: The catchy headline was catchier than the rest.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors made the poster catchier.
meanings.sent3: The catchy ad was so catchier that it drew in a huge crowd.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious enthusiasm was catchier than a yawn in a quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The unique design made the packaging catchier, standing out on the shelf.
